sys_update_xml.name: asmt_metric_category_fe6c522adb8480105d01f0ec0f96193c
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsePlease think about the ongoing process of promoting your employee. Then, please respond to the statements below

 

 

Select the number that best corresponds with your experience. For instance, select 7 if you agree with the statement, select 1 if you disagree with the statement, or if you have no strong feeling either way, select 4. You can also indicate “Not Applicable.”  

 

Your answers will help us improve our support, and we appreciate you taking the time to share feedback. Note: Your name will be attached to the responses you submit. 

 

]]>

sys_update_xml.name: asmt_metric_category_b41eae2adbc480105d01f0ec0f96191c
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsePlease think about the overall process for the promotion of your employee. Then, please respond to the statements below.
 

Select the number that best corresponds with your experience. For instance, select 7 if you agree with the statement, select 1 if you disagree with the statement, or if you have no strong feeling either way, select 4. You can also indicate “Not Applicable.”  

 

Your answers will help us improve our support, and we appreciate you taking the time to share feedback. Note: Your name will be attached to the responses you submit. 

 

]]>

sys_update_xml.payload:
falsePlease think about your recent promotion. Then, please respond to the statements below.

 

 

Select the number that best corresponds with your experience. For instance, select 7 if you agree with the statement, select 1 if you disagree with the statement, or if you have no strong feeling either way, select 4. You can also indicate “Not Applicable.”  

 

Your answers will help us improve our support, and we appreciate you taking the time to share feedback. Note: Your name will be attached to the responses you submit. 

 

 

]]>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_hr_core_email_content_312f52eadb8480105d01f0ec0f9619b4
sys_update_xml.payload:
${subject_person.first_name}, 

 

Congratulations! HR is here to provide helpful resources and support during this change. Get a sense of what to expect by reading these articles: 

 

-Transitioning out of your current role

-Assimilating into a new team & job role

 

If you need assistance at any time, contact HR via the Employee Service Center. We’d be glad to help.

Thank you,

Your HR team 

]]>Email to notify employee of job changeCongratulations on your promotion!sn_hr_core_email_contentadmin2019-09-25 17:01:34global312f52eadb8480105d01f0ec0f9619b42Email to notify employee of job change532da270dad21200a4656ede91f9331e532da270dad21200a4656ede91f9331esn_hr_core_email_content_312f52eadb8480105d01f0ec0f9619b4admin2019-10-04 19:06:08sn_hr_le_case

truetldlqSvswzEwXOcTk+Wa0LWWvfM=false0Welcome to the guided setup for the Promotion content pack. The content pack was created to help expedite deployments and give you an example of how to leverage the lifecycle event engine. The various sections will take you through what needs to be configured. Note: this does not guide you through every single step in the lifecycle event, just the main ones that need updating. We recommend you review all tasks after completing this to ensure they make sense to your organization. To do this, as your LE Admin go to Lifecycle Events in your navigator > Manage Lifecycle Events > Promotion.

]]>5falsetrue100sn_hr_le.admin/sn_hr_le_promotion_guided_setup_introduction.dotruetruegsw_content_groupsarah.means@snc2019-10-09 20:30:160975978bdb1080505d01f0ec0f9619ac30Promotion HRBU Content Configuration532da270dad21200a4656ede91f9331e532da270dad21200a4656ede91f9331egsw_content_group_0975978bdb1080505d01f0ec0f9619acsarah.means@snc2019-10-10 15:07:26Promotion HRBU Content Configuration1

true
These are the required approvals for when a person is going through a promotion. OOB we have 5 people: HR, the existing manager and their manager, the new manager and their manager. Please update accordingly to fit your organization.
